text: Anders Jacobsson (born 1963) and Sören Olsson (born 1964) are two Swedish cousins who are writers of children's literature and young literature. They are mostly known for works like the Sune and Bert books, but also but also Tuva-Lisa and Emanuel. They have also written scripts for several TV series. == References == ==Other websites== * Sören & Anders website Category:Swedish children's writers
title: Anders Jacobsson and Sören Olsson
